articles.author: Robert Z. Pearlman
articles.title: Russia's only active launch pad for cosmonauts damaged by Soyuz crew launch to International Space Station - Space
articles.description: Two cosmonauts and an American astronaut arrived at the International Space Station safely, but damage caused by their launch may delay future Russian crew and cargo flights to the orbiting complex.
articles.content: Russia's successful launch of three new crew members to the International Space Station on Thursday (Nov. 27), resulted in damage to country's only active launch pad for crewed spaceflights to the or… [+2467 chars]
